org.formix.dsx.serialization

Class XmlSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.formix.dsx.serialization.XmlSerializer

  • public class XmlSerializer
extends Object
    Serializes an object into its XML representation.
    Author:
    jpgravel

      • getDeserializationListeners

        public List<SerializationEventListener> getDeserializationListeners()
        Gets deserialization listeners.
        Returns:
        deserialization listeners.

      • addDeserializationListener

        public void addDeserializationListener(SerializationEventListener l)
        Add a new deserialization listener.
        Parameters:
        l - the listener added.

      • removeDeserializationListener

        public void removeDeserializationListener(SerializationEventListener l)
        Remove a deserialization listener.
        Parameters:
        l - The serialization listener to add.

      • getCollectionMap

        public HashMap<Class<?>,Class<?>> getCollectionMap()
        Returns a map between interfaces and class implementations for any collection types. Default mappings: Collection -> ArrayList, List -> ArrayList, Set -> HashSet, SortedSet -> TreeSet
        Returns:
        a map defining which class to instantiate when a Collection is encountered in a class member.

      • getClassResolutionPackages

        public List<String> getClassResolutionPackages()
        Returns the list of packages to loop into when deserializing an object and trying to instanciate a type with a simple class name.
        Returns:
        class resolution package names.

      • registerClass

        public void registerClass(Class<?> type)
        Used to quickly map a class simple name to the corresponding Class type. Mandatory for classes having the XmlRootElement annotation. In the later case, the XmlRootElement.name (first character capitalized) is used to map with the class correct type, possibly overriding an existing type previously mapped during class resolution.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to be added to the general type mapper of the current serializer.

      • registerPackage

        public void registerPackage(String packageName)
        Add a package to the list of lookup packages.
        Parameters:
        packageName - the package name to add.

      • deserialize

        public Object deserialize(XmlElement root)
                   throws XmlException
        Deserialize the given XML into an object.
        Parameters:
        root - The root node of the XML to deserialize.
        Returns:
        the deserialized object.
        Throws:
        XmlException - Thrown when a problem occurs during deserialization.

      • deserialize

        public <T> T deserialize(XmlElement root,
                         Class<T> type)
                  throws XmlException
        Deserialize an XML tree into the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The infered type for the parameter {code type}.
        Parameters:
        root - The XML root element.
        type - The type of the desired object.
        Returns:
        a deserialized object from the given XML.
        Throws:
        XmlException - Thrown when a problem occurs during deserialization.

      • onBeforeDeserialization

        protected void onBeforeDeserialization(SerializationEvent e)
        Method called to fire the beforeDeserialization events.
        Parameters:
        e - the serialization event.

        Method called to fire the afterDeserialization events.
        Parameters:
        e - the serialization event.

      • parseDate

        protected Date parseDate(String dateString)
                  throws ParseException
        Parse a date. The defeualt implementation expects the following format: ISO 8601: 1994-11-05T08:15:30-05:00
        Parameters:
        dateString - the date string to deserialize.
        Returns:
        the corresponding date object.
        Throws:
        ParseException - Thrown if a parsing problem occurs.

      • formatDate

        protected String formatDate(Date date)
        Format a date to the desired format. The default implementation use the following format: ISO 8601: 1994-11-05T08:15:30-05:00.
        Parameters:
        date - The date to format.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the date.

      • serialize

        public XmlElement serialize(Object target)
                     throws XmlException
        Serializes an object into its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        target - The object to serialize.
        Returns:
        The root XmlElement of the serialized object.
        Throws:
        XmlException - Thrown if a serialization problem occurs.

      • serialize

        public XmlElement serialize(Object target,
                            String rootName)
                     throws XmlException
        Serializes an object with a different XmlElement root name.
        Parameters:
        target - the object to serialize.
        rootName - the desired root node name.
        Returns:
        The root element of the resulting serialization.
        Throws:
        XmlException - Thrown if a serialization problem occurs.
